cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 1 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

dorms.name: Standard 8 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: The perfect choice for solo travellers or groups of friends. Our dorm rooms feature our brand-new designer bunks with privacy screens, built-in lights and USB charging stations.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

rateRuleViolationsMessages.description: Requires a minimum of 2 nights stay on your dates

privates.name: Deluxe Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: The perfect choice for those wanting privacy, comfort and luxury. Boasting a queen bed, TV, mini kitchenette and en-suite bathroom with towels provided.

specialEventConditions.title: CHRISTMAS AND NEW YEAR
specialEventConditions.description: The full remaining cost of any booking for stays between the 22nd of December and the 5th of January (inclusive) must be paid at the time of booking. You will be contacted shortly after booking with further details from Bounce Noosa. Payment can be made by bank transfer or the credit card nominated at the time of booking. Failure to respond to Bounce Noosa's communications within 7 days after booking your booking will be cancelled. All bookings that have not been prepaid by the 1st of December will be cancelled.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 4th Dec 2025 (AEST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 4th Dec 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
